title: At Polish Border, Migrants Say Belarus Waved Them Through
content:
1. At Polish Border, Migrants Say Belarus Waved Them Through  The Wall Street Journal
  2. LIVE: Migrants evacuated from Belarus arrive back in Iraq  Reuters
  3. Belarus-Poland Face-Off Relaxes as Some Migrants Fly Home  The New York Times
  4. Why Iraqi Kurds Are Fleeing Their Peaceful Homeland  Bloomberg
  5. Iraqis lured to Belarus on a false promise died trying to get into Poland. Now hundreds want to go back home.  CBS News

localize.title: ポーランドの国境で、移民たちはベラルーシが彼らを通してくれたと言っています。
在波兰边境，移民说白俄罗斯挥手让他们通过
在波蘭邊境，移民說白俄羅斯揮手讓他們通過
